purpose: To automate the generation of admin panels, APIs, and UIs from existing database schemas.
principle: Leverages AI agents and large language models to interpret database schemas and generate corresponding application components.
reusability: Offers a plug-and-play solution for database-driven application development with potential API integrations.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex database schemas, and lacks a self-evolving runtime as of now.
